00023 #ifndef __OBDGUI_H
00024 #define __OBDGUI_H
00025 
00026 
00027 /// UI State
00028 enum ui_state {
00029     UI_STOPPED, ///< OBD GPS Logger not running
00030     UI_STARTING, ///< OBD GPS Logger starting
00031     UI_STARTED ///< OBD GPS Logger started
00032 };
00033 
00034 /// UI Trip State
00035 enum trip_state {
00036     TRIP_NONE, ///< All trip buttons disabled
00037     TRIP_STARTED, ///< On a trip
00038     TRIP_STOPPED ///< Not on a trip
00039 };
00040 
00041 /// What we want to convert to
00042 enum obd_convert_type {
00043     CONVERT_KML, ///< Output a google earth file
00044     CONVERT_CSV ///< Output a comma-separated values file
00045 };
00046 
00047 #endif // __OBDGUI_H
